item.title: Vegan Ice Cream
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 1 cup cashew milk
  • 2 cans coconut milk
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla bean paste
  • 2/3 cup sugar
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt

Directions

  1. combine all ingredients
  2. chill mixture
  3. make ice cream
